00079                 public void EditStockItem()
00080                 {
00081             try
00082             {
00083                 StockItem si = this._View.StockItem;
00084                 String stockCode = this._StockItemView.StockCode;
00085                 String supplier = this._StockItemView.SupplierName;
00086                 String name = this._StockItemView.ItemName;
00087                 int currentStock = this._StockItemView.CurrentStock;
00088                 int reqStock = this._StockItemView.RequiredStock;
00089                 double price = this._StockItemView.UnitCost;
00090                 bool areValuesValid = this._Model.ValidateStockItem(stockCode, name, supplier, price, reqStock, currentStock);
00091                 if (areValuesValid)
00092                 {
00093                     this._Model.EditStockItem(si, stockCode, supplier, name, currentStock, reqStock, price);
00094                 }
00095                 else
00096                 {
00097                     this._View.DisplayValidationErrors(this._Model.StockItemErrors());
00098                     this._Model.ClearStockItemErrors();
00099                 }
00100             }
00101             catch (FormatException e)
00102             {
00103                 DisplayError(e);
00104             }
00105                         
00106                 }
00107 
00111                 public void EditBankAccount()
00112                 {
00113             try
00114             {
00115                 BankAccount ba = this._View.BankAccount;
00116                 String surname = this._BankAccountView.Surname;
00117                 int accountNumber = this._BankAccountView.AccountNumber;
00118                 bool areValuesValid = this._Model.ValidateBankAccount(accountNumber, surname);
00119                 if (areValuesValid)
00120                 {
00121                     this._Model.EditBankAccount(ba, surname, accountNumber);
00122                 }
00123                 else
00124                 {
00125                     this._View.DisplayValidationErrors(this._Model.BankAccountErrors());
00126                     this._Model.ClearBankAccountErrors();
00127                 }
00128             }
00129             catch (FormatException e)
00130             {
00131                 DisplayError(e);
00132             }
00133                         
00134                 }
00135 
00139                 public void OrderItem()
00140                 {
00141             try
00142             {
00143                 BankAccount ba = this._View.BankAccount;
00144                 StockItem si = this._View.StockItem;
00145                 this.EditStockItem();
00146                 int quantity = this._View.Quantity;
00147                 this._Model.OrderItem(si, ba, quantity);
00148             }
00149             catch (FormatException e)
00150             {
00151                 DisplayError(e);
00152             }
00153             catch (NotEnoughFundsException e)
00154             {
00155                 DisplayError(e);
00156             }
00157                 }
00158

00197         private void DisplayError(Exception e)
00198         {
00199             ErrorMessageCollection col = new ErrorMessageCollection();
00200             col.Add(new ErrorMessage(e.Message));
00201             this._View.DisplayValidationErrors(col);
00202         }
